Create a global system of universal healthcare: As the ruler of the world, I would prioritize the health and well-being of every individual. I would establish a universal healthcare system that provides access to quality medical care and medication for everyone, regardless of their financial status or location. This would greatly reduce the burden of disease and improve the overall quality of life for people all over the world.

Promote sustainable development: I would focus on promoting sustainable development and reducing our reliance on fossil fuels. This would involve investing in renewable energy sources, such as solar and wind power, and implementing policies to reduce greenhouse gas emissions. By doing so, we can mitigate the effects of climate change and ensure a sustainable future for generations to come.

Foster global cooperation: As the ruler of the world, I would work to foster global cooperation and understanding. This would involve promoting diplomacy and peaceful resolution of conflicts, as well as working to address common global challenges such as poverty, inequality, and disease. By working together, we can create a more just and equitable world.

Establish a global education system: I would establish a global education system that provides access to quality education for every individual, regardless of their location or financial status. This would involve investing in infrastructure, training teachers, and providing resources to schools and universities around the world. By doing so, we can empower people and provide them with the skills and knowledge they need to succeed in the modern world.

Promote gender equality: As the ruler of the world, I would work to promote gender equality and empower women and girls around the world. This would involve implementing policies to address gender-based violence, promoting women's rights, and providing equal opportunities for education and employment. By doing so, we can create a more just and equitable society.
